title: CONCAT (Function)
text:
FUNCTION CONCAT :
IString
Concatenates two strings
| See:
SBD.IBuilder
| The multiple nesting of CONCAT calls can often be replaced much faster via multiple calls to IBuilder.WriteIString.

rows.Name: itfHead
rows.Comment: The first part of the new string

rows: The second part of the new string

The resource that this function is working on. It will
contain the result after the function call and will also be
returned by this function so it can be used in nested calls.
